title: Bert Got Offended By Something One Of His Sons Did
description:
Here’s a riddle! What do you get when you give a teenage boy money without clear instruction on what the money should be spent on? Zero campus involvement and 14 Twitch streamer subscriptions!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
